CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bends the grid’s path into wavy motion – like giving it a little dance step.

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Sets how fine or chunky the grid looks in XY – shrink it for crisp detail or go big for bold vibes.

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Travel speed through the Blue Steel grid – from a laid-back cruise to a hyperspace blast.
